example.eg: Abigail suspected it was Trevor's underlying guilt that caused him to set up the charitable fund.
example.egtrans: 阿比盖尔怀疑是特雷弗潜在的罪恶感促使他设立了这样一个慈善基金。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 含蓄的，潜在的, 背后的，根本的

example.eg: The gardener lifted away a slab of grass with some of the underlying soil.
example.egtrans: 园丁移走了一块草皮，草皮还带着一些下面的泥土。

dsense.name: underlying
dsense.guideword: (cause, factor: at the root of [sth]) (原因)

example.eg: The underlying causes of some cancers are hereditary.
example.egtrans: 有些癌症是遗传因素造成的。

example.eg: A belief in creationism underlies their arguments.
A layer of sedimentary rock underlies the soil.

dsense.name: underlying condition
dsense.guideword: often plural (chronic health problem: weakens immunity)

trans_examp.trans_cn: 潜在健康状况，基础疾病

example.eg: I had a hard time trying to determine the poem's underlying meaning.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 潜在的意义, 暗含的意义, 深层含义

example.eg: Although he claimed his motives were altruistic, the underlying reason was financial gain.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 内在原因, 根本原因, 真正原因
